name: Black Powder Spectacle
text: You can sacrifice ammunition to make a grand spectacle.
prerequisites: Amateur Gunslinger or the grit class feature, base attack bonus +4.
benefit: When you spend a swift action to attempt a performance combat check, you can sacrifice one cartridge or an amount of black powder required for a single shot to make either a loud sound or an impressive flash. If you choose to make your weapon’s report louder, you gain a +4 bonus on all Intimidate checks you attempt for 1 round. If you choose to create an impressive flash, you gain a +4 bonus on any Perform checks you attempt for 1 round.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points when using Black Powder Spectacle in order to gain a +4 bonus on Intimidate checks and Perform checks for 1 round.
text_zh: 你能够牺牲一些火药来制造出让人惊叹的画卷。
prerequisites_zh: 业余铳士或勇毅（Grit）职业能力，BAB+4。
benefit_zh: 当你花费迅捷动作来尝试演武检定时，你能够牺牲单次射击所需要的一发定装弹（cartridge）或一份黑火药（black powder）来产生一声鸣响或引人注目的闪光。若你选择让你的武器发出鸣响，那么你在1轮内的所有威吓检定均会获得+4加值。若你选择制造闪光，那么1轮内你所尝试的任何表演检定均会获得+4加值。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗2点耐力来在使用黑火药表演进行威吓检定和演武检定时获得+4加值，持续1轮。
